MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH42 postcode area of Dunbar. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 09.00am to safely remove the generator and reconnect to mains and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.00am. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 09:06am on Friday, 30 October 2020.
